page-title: Le Chat à Paillettes • Lucía Petit, Frontend Developer
intro-txt: For several years, I had the privilege of contributing to the enchanting world of Disneyland Paris, where I held various positions related to customer service. After a rewarding period of parental leave, I made the bold decision to pursue my passion for technology and transition into the field of web development. Driven by my insatiable curiosity and desire to learn, I am determined to apply the creativity and determination I have acquired to my new career, where I can continue to create captivating experiences, this time online.
ListenToMe-txt: End-of-course project developed using React, Redux, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS on the frontend, and Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL on the backend. The design is responsive and includes a dark mode.
JuPsychomot-txt: Website designed for a psychomotor therapist who needed to explain her practice and skills, and a form that would allow her to organize contact with new patients.
response: You will get a response as soon as possible.
